name: Amazon CodeWhisperer
description: Amazon CodeWhisperer is an AI coding assistant integrated into the broader Amazon Q Developer service. It provides real-time code suggestions, security scanning, and reference tracking within various IDEs, with a strong focus on supporting AWS development.
features: Real-time code suggestions (single line to full functions)
Support for many programming languages (Python, Java, JS, C#, etc.)
IDE integration (VS Code, JetBrains, Cloud9, Lambda, JupyterLab)
Reference tracker for open-source code resemblance and licenses
Built-in security scanning (powered by Amazon CodeGuru)
Optimized for AWS APIs and services
Customization based on private codebase (Professional tier)

pricing.free_tier: Individual tier is free with AWS Builder ID (core suggestions, limited scans).

paid_tiers.name: Professional Tier (Amazon Q Developer Pro)
paid_tiers.description: Per user per month pricing. Higher limits, organizational controls, customization, extensive security scanning.

pricing.notes: Part of the broader Amazon Q Developer service.

cons: Optimized for AWS, potentially less ideal for non-AWS stacks
Part of the larger AWS ecosystem complexity

technical_specifications.api_type: Delivered as IDE extensions (Amazon Q has APIs)
technical_specifications.platforms: IDE Extensions (VS Code, JetBrains, AWS Cloud9, Lambda, JupyterLab, SageMaker Studio, EMR Studio)

performance_metrics.accuracy: High relevance, especially for AWS APIs

security_compliance.data_protection: Governed by AWS terms. Options to control telemetry/data sharing (especially Pro tier).
